TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kanahcian, title = Kanahcian, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kanahcian} }

S.FORM: Kanahcian Itiniay i Haiduan Cen no Taitung ko Kanahcian a niyaro', 39 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 145 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 142 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 89%, Amis 1%, Paiwan 1%, Puyuma 1%, Truku 1%, roma 5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.

Kanahcian Itiniay i Haidoan Cen no Taitong ko Kanahcian a niyaro', 39 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 145 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 142 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 89%, Amis 1%, Paiwan 1%, Poyoma 1%, Troko 1%, roma 5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko paisingan i niyaro'.
